You are a McKinsey consultant, help Bloom.pm develop a proposal and a landing page

for a new program they will pitch as an engagement enhancer for corporates using the skills and experience they developed running virtual social enterprise accelerators since 2016. Give them feedback on this proposal: May 2023 Introduction At our company, we understand the importance of a healthy hybrid work culture. We are excited to present a pilot program to support and improve your employees' personal and professional growth, leveraging our extensive experience as a social enterprise accelerator. Since 2015 we have been developing our values-based personal and professional growth methodology for entrepreneurship education, fostering inclusive and impact-driven economies. Through our programs, we've impacted thousands of individuals and over 850 teams, many of which have launched, grown, and mobilized millions in funding. Gallup's validated Q12 engagement survey indicates that only 20% of the world's workers are engaged and since the pandemic in 2020 it has been on the decline resulting in lower performance. We believe in the power of remote/hybrid organizations and that it’s possible to take advantage of going remote/hybrid. Remote work, when leveraged correctly, allows companies to save money, boost employee productivity, and improve retention. Using our tried and tested models and concepts in our methodology, we help individuals and organizations outline a working model for productivity and engagement. We identify and implement coaching solutions to propel learning, organizational effectiveness, and personal and professional development. What We Can Do For Your Company In 2023, offices worldwide struggle to balance rising employee demand for more remote flexibility, less meeting time, and work-life balance with a need to keep employees engaged, productive, and motivated. At our company, we transitioned in 2018 to operating our organization and delivering customer services in fully remote or hybrid environments. Using cutting-edge tools, positive reinforcement strategies, and strengths-based development, we have grown our company to 4 continents and 12 hours of time difference while remaining on the leading edge of business acceleration programs. With this program, you can expect the following: Increased Employee Engagement: The tailored activities and personalized growth plans will help ignite each employee's passion and motivation to contribute meaningfully to the organization. Healthier Remote Work Culture: Our program focuses on creating a supportive remote work environment, addressing remote employees' challenges, and promoting a sense of belonging and connectedness with the team. Enhanced Organizational Performance: With improved engagement levels, your employees will be better equipped to collaborate, innovate, and drive growth, leading to positive impacts on your organization's performance. Assessing Impact To evaluate the impact of our pilot program on remote work engagement and effectiveness, we propose working with your company to assess the following KPIs to monitor progress and ensure our solution aligns with your organization's goals: Remote work capacity: Assessed across the organization. Employee engagement: Assessed by team members Productivity: Assessed during the program we will monitor/report team member accomplishments, streaks, and post-program monitoring of selected KPIs. Program Overview Our pilot program aims to catalyze positive change in your remote work culture and improve overall team health, productivity, and performance. Our program will be tailored to suit the unique needs of your organization, and we have a few options for engaging with our training ranging from light touch to training one of your team members - such as an HR representative or team lead - on our methodology so that it may become a repeatable process ingrained in your organizational culture. In addition, they will receive weekly coaching to successfully implement our combined personal and professional growth method within your organization. Our Method Our methodology helps people and teams identify their shared purpose and build towards enhanced shared success. We use reflective practices, personal and professional development assessments, and a library of activities designed to help your employees thrive at work holistically. We focus on fostering self-awareness and identification of purpose at work, effective communication, collaboration, resilience, and personal growth – all critical skills for modern hybrid word environments

Here are some critiques and suggestions for further improving the proposal:

1. Strengthen the value proposition. While the proposal articulates Bloom's experience and track record, the unique value proposition is still not entirely clear. I would suggest revising the first paragraph to more explicitly state the key benefits and outcomes clients can expect from the program. For example, "Bloom's engagement enhancer program leverages our proven methodology to increase employee engagement and productivity by X% within 3 months."

2. Highlight methodology and tools. The proposal mentions Bloom's methodology, tools, and library of activities but does not provide much detail. I would suggest dedicating a short section to briefly describe the methodology and key tools/resources in more depth. For example, describe the assessments used, types of activities, coaching approach, etc. This helps demonstrate Bloom's expertise and the substance behind the program.

3. Include pricing information. The proposal lacks any pricing details which clients will certainly want to know before engaging Bloom. I would suggest adding a section on program pricing, including any options at different price points. This could also include information on ROI and potential cost savings for clients.  

4. strengthen case studies. The single case study example is fairly weak. I would suggest revising this section to include 2-3 more detailed case studies highlighting quantifiable impacts and direct quotes/testimonials from clients. Case studies from companies similar to the target audience would be especially persuasive.

5. Consider a sample timeline. Adding a high-level timeline or schedule of activities for the engagement enhancer program may help clients better envision how it would unfold and what they can expect. This visualizes the scope and flow of the program.

Briefly highlighting some alternative options at varying scopes, durations, and price points may appeal to more potential clients. Explain how the options differ and the impacts/outcomes clients can achieve at each level.

1.  **Enterprise development support to help projects grow and increase impact,** along with
